news.title: Andhra Pradesh High Court Launches E-Filing System
news.content: The Andhra Pradesh High Court has launched a comprehensive e-filing system that allows lawyers and litigants to file cases online. This digital initiative is expected to reduce physical crowding in courts and expedite the judicial process.

news.title: High Court Directions on Water Rights Dispute
news.content: The Andhra Pradesh High Court has issued important directions regarding water rights disputes between states, emphasizing equitable distribution and sustainable water management practices for agricultural development.

news.title: Consumer Protection Guidelines Issued by AP High Court
news.content: The Andhra Pradesh High Court has issued detailed guidelines for consumer protection, particularly focusing on e-commerce transactions and digital payment disputes, ensuring better protection for consumers in the digital age.
